snippet: James Whiteside — who created a stir in several roles since joining American Ballet Theater as a soloist last fall — is being promoted to principal dancer with the company, its artistic director, Kevin McKenzie, announced on Wednesday.
abstract: James Whiteside — who created a stir in several roles since joining American Ballet Theater as a soloist last fall — is being promoted to principal dancer with the company, its artistic director, Kevin McKenzie, announced on Wednesday.

headline.main: James Whiteside Promoted to Principal Dancer at American Ballet Theater
headline.print_headline: James Whiteside Promoted At Ballet Theater
